events.title: NFS
rules: Individual event.
No extra accessories like joystick or headset will be provided.

events.title: Counter Strike
rules: 5 make a team.
No extra accessories like joystick or headset will be provided.
No cheat codes!

events.title: TechPresento
rules: 3 make a team.
Time limit 8 + 2 mins.
Paper to be submitted in IEEE format and mailed to SDITCSIS18@GMAIL.COM on or before 10th feb 2018.
The mail must include the title, team name and college name.
Confirmations will be sent by 15th feb 2018.
Spot registrations are not allowed.

events.title: Quizholic
rules: 3 make a team.
Prelims will be conducted.
No gadgets are allowed.
Judges's decision will be final.

events.title: Web Masters
rules: 2 make a team.
Necessary hardware and software will be provided.
Libraries & tools : Photoshop, jQuery, Bootstrap, AngularJs, Notepad++, Images
Time duration : 2Hrs
No gadgets are allowed.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Spycoder
rules: 2 make a team.
No gadgets are allowed.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
Judge's Decision will be final.

events.title: Grapix
rules: 2 make a team.
Necessary softwares will be provided.
No gadgets are allowed.
Time duration 1.5 Hrs
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Techkrithi
rules: 2 members make a team.
Duration 8 + 2 minutes.
Topic: Recent trends in civil engineering
Papers have to be submitted in IEEE format

events.title: Bridge Making
rules: 2 members make a team.
Time given is 1 Hour 30 minutes.
Bridge making materials will be provided.
Truss is compulsory.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Center line marking
rules: 3 members make a team.
1st round: Aptitude test (Half an hour).
2nd round: Center line marking in field (3 Hours).
All the required materials will be provided and no extra materials must be brought by the participants except calculator.
Decision will be based on accuracy and timing.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Mind Tickler
rules: Preliminary round will be conducted.
Questions are related to civil engineering field.
2 make a team.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Solid Waste Management
rules: 3 participants in a team.
30 minutes will be given to search the waste material around the campus.
Any civil structures / Environmental management concept to be built.
1 Hour 30 minutes will be provided (Excluding the first 30min).
Glue and threads will be provided.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Paper Presentation
rules: Time limit, 10 + 2 min.
Two teams from each college.
First 20 teams are allowed.
Two make team.

events.title: Debate
rules: Prelims if required.
Two make a team.
Topics will be given on spot.

events.title: Foundry
rules: Design will be given on spot.
Time limit, 60 + 15 min.

events.title: Robo War
rules: Three make a team.
Time limit 10min.
Weight restrictions.

events.title: Scrap Welding
rules: Two make a team.
Design will be given on spot.
Time limit, 15 + 5 min.

events.title: Virtual Pilot
rules: Solo Event.
Software used is Phoenix RC.
Transmitter will be provided.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
Contestants will be given various tasks like maneuvering, payload drop etc.

events.title: RC Flying
rules: Electric RC Plane is considered for contest.
Wing dimensions: 1m maximum.
Fuselage length: 850cm maximum.
Various tasks will be given in field.
Judge's decision is final.

events.title: Gliders
rules: Gliders shpuld be brought by participants.
Either hand launch or catapult launch can be used.
Various tasks are given to complete and marks are given accordingly.
Judge's decision is final.

events.title: Paper Planes
rules: All contests are held indoor without wind.
Paper planes must be constructed out of 1 sheet of paper which will be provided.
Paper planes have to be built and modified only by folding.
Only hand launch is allowed.

events.title: Paper Presentation
rules: Maximum number of participants is 2 in a team.
IEEE format should be followed.
Maximum of 10 minutes is given to present the paper.
Topics related to aeronautics or aerospace is accepted.

events.title: Circuit-Perception
rules: Maximum of 2 members per team is allowed.
1st round - Prelims 25 questions. Duration is 30 minutes.
2nd round - Electrovate. Duration is 1 hour.

events.title: Tech-Excellence
rules: Maximum of 3 members per team is allowed.
1st round - Prelims 25 questions. Duration is 30 minutes.
2nd round - Quibble. Duration is 30 minutes.
3rd round - Trouble shooting. Duration is 30 minutes (HDL or MATLAB)

events.title: RC-Xtreme
rules: Only 3 members allowed per team.
The maximum voltage input to the car should not exceed more than 12 Volts.
The maximum dimensions of the car can be: length - 30cm, breadth - 25cm, height - 15cm.
Only electronic (Battery powered) cars are allowed.

events.title: Electro-Charades
rules: Maximum of 3 members per team is allowed.
1st round - Prelims 25 questions. Duration is 30 minutes.
2nd round - Technical dum charades.

events.title: Tech-Nirupan
rules: Paper should be in IEEE format. Not more than 6 pages.
Maximum number of in a team is 2.
Abstract of the paper must be mailed to SAMBHRAM2018EC@GMAIL.COM on or before 19/2/2018.
Soft copies of the submitted paper should be in .DOCX or .PDF format and should have 2 hard copies.
Presentation time will be 10 + 2 min.

events.title: Lights, Camera & Action
rules: Topic will be given on spot.
Team of 3 members.
Duration of the movie should not exceed more than 5 min.
Video should be submitted as per scheduled time.
Judging will be based on Clarity of message, Creativity and Production value.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.
Note: This particular event will begin/start on 1st day of Sambhram and final submission will be on 2nd Day of Sambhram.

events.title: The Henna Art
rules: 2 make a team.
Time limit 60min.
Required materials should be brought by the participants.
Theme: Indian bridal design (One full hand).

events.title: Mind Your Mind
rules: Competition will be held in English and Kannada. Participants can choose from either of the languages to participate.
Topics on spot.
Participants are encouraged to put for original and unaided writings during competition.
The word count per entry is 750 to 1000 words. Please aim to keep within this.
Time limit is 30 min. Can be decreased to 20 min if necessary.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
Required stationary is to be brought by the participants.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.

events.title: Dance Mania
rules: Minimum of 6 members and maximum of 10 participants.
Eastern and western forms are entertained.
Time duration 5 + 1 (Includeing the stage setting).
Judgement criteria: The dancers, Co-ordination, Stage creation,  Innovation and presentation.
Vulgarity and obscenity will result in disqualification of the team.
Marks will be deducted if the time limit exceeds.
Music should be submitted in CD/Pendrive at least an hour before the competition to the organizers.
Props allowed.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Crazy Marketiers
rules: Time duration 4 + 1 mins
Theme is open to the participants
Vulgarity will result in disqualification.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.

events.title: Mirror Image
rules: 2 Make a team.
Participants should bring their own colors, brushes etc.
Time limit 60 mins.
Topic will be given on the spot.
Participants will be judged on the basis of creativity, innovations and designs.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.

events.title: Frame It
rules: Cameras to be bought by the participants.
Mobile photography is not allowed.
Formatting the memory is compulsory before the event begins.
Final submission of image in JPEG formatt.
Editing is not allowed.
Topic on the spot.
Photo should be captured within the campus itself.
Judge's decision is final.

events.title: Kosupure
rules: The contest is open to characters from Movies, TV shows, Comic books, Cartoon character, Video games and Card games.
Your costume must cover swimsuit areas - No nudity, Body paint costumes are not eligible for craftsmanship.
Overly political or religious statements are not allowed on stage.
No pyrotechnics, fire, explosive devices.
Special effects can be used during the competition. This includes smoke/smog machines and flash powder.
Contestants can bring their own audio tracks and allowed to perform for 2 minutes.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.
Note: Contestants should bring a reference photo of the character. They are portraying.

events.title: The Chasers
rules: 3 make a team.
Use of cellphones will not be allowed during the event.
Wandering outside the college campus will disqualify the team.
The decision of event coordinators will be final and binding.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.

events.title: Songs Unlimited
rules: 3 make a team.
Only bollywood songs.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
Judge's decision will be final.

events.title: Rhytmic Ride
rules: Time duration 3 + 1 mins.
Filmy or album songs are allowed (English, Hindi). No classical songs).
Karoke is not allowed.
Musical instruments can be used only for pitch identification.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.

events.title: Face Off
rules: Selected students will be interviewed individually by a committee.
The committee consists of a panel of threee members.
Students will be asked stressful questions to test their patience and communication skills under a stressfull situation.
Judge's decision will be final and binding.

events.title: Pretty Cute-Icles
rules: Time duration is 60 Mins.
Work must be applied on natural nails only.
Items must be in original containers that clearly read 'Soak of Gel' during inspection in the beginnig.
Items brought must be displayed.
Nail art may be flat or be raised surface.

events.title: The Performers
rules: 4 make a team.
The maximum time limit is 4 minutes per performance. After 4 minutes the music will be fade out.
Teams may use props.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.

events.title: Comic Con
rules: 2 make a team.
Use of cellphones is prohibited.
Prelims will be conducted if necessary.
The topics will cover famous english TV series, anime and comic movies.
